page.title: 08Education, Pitreavie School.
page.content: In 1969 Pitreavie Primary School (our school) was built. It was built on farmland and started with 200 pupils. Later it rose to 700 pupils. There are 16 classrooms and rooms for a headteacher, two assistants, a secretary and a janitor. There are also 16 toilets, a gym/dining hall with its own kitchen, a stage/T.V. room and a medical block. In one of the classrooms is a nursery, where 20 children attend in the morning and a different 20 attend in the afternoon. Our school is built on a square and in the centre is a play area with a sand pit, adventure area and some rabbit hutches. We have a football pitch and other grass areas and there is a hard surfaced area with a climbing frame and netball pitches. We have the local community hut in our playground.
